actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation

official_title: A bill to increase from $1,000,000 to $2,000,000 the amount of any small shore and beach restoration project which the Secretary of the Army is authorized to construct without specific authorization by Congress.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to authorize the Secretary of the Army to construct small shore and beach restoration projects which do not exceed $2,000,000 (currently, $1,000,000) without specific authorization by Congress. States that this increase shall apply only to such projects under contracts for construction after the enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to increase from $1,000,000 to $2,000,000 the amount of any small shore and beach restoration project which the Secretary of the Army is authorized to construct without specific authorization by Congress.
